attributes.additional_details:
We the citizens of the United Kingdom demand that we are given the choice of whether the UK remains in the EU. The majority of the public are sick of hearing about the ludicrous amounts which Brussels demands from us the taxpayers. We get nowhere near as much out of the EU as is put in and as a nation we are suffering and struggling.

A reciprocal agreement for the purposes of trade and vat should be agreed such as the agreement Norway has in place.
